divs: Sighting DetailsAfter noting the convergance of 5 high flying jets,apperance of football form.Silver or seemingly irridecent form appeared for 1,2 seconds.Jets were above 50 thousand feet object was 3,4 thousand feet high. It was a perfectly clear day,I was riding south bound on I275 near michigan ave.my wife was driving.Object appeard as if a tv screen suddenly went on than off in a instant. I had no real feelings, other than how others might react to my witnessing of event.
Summary: irridescent football form appeared after convergence of 5 high flying jets
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around January 15th 2012
